Sentences: Naʻa ne ʻalu ki he fale ako.
ʻOku ne kai mo e fāmili ʻi he ʻaho ni.
Te u toki nofo ʻi Tonga ʻapongipongi.

Categories: Formal & Professional Speech (Business, Legal, Medical, Technical)
Sentences: Kuo ʻikai ke nau ʻalu ki he fiefia.
Kapau ʻe ʻi ai ha taimi, te u tokoni atu.
ʻOku ʻikai ke maʻu e tamasiʻi ʻene tohi.
Naʻe ʻave ʻe Mele e ngaahi meʻakai ki he ngaahi fāmili.

Categories: Named Entity Recognition (NER) Data (People, Places, Dates, Organizations)
Sentences: ʻE fai ʻe Sione ʻa e ngāue ʻapongipongi.
ʻOku ne toe ʻilo e lea fakaTonga lelei.

Categories: Paraphrased & Augmented Sentences (Rewritten Variations for Robustness)
Sentences: Kapau naʻe ʻikai ke ʻi ai ha tauhi, naʻa mohe pē ʻa e pēpē.
